rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable TM.TMRPT

datasetVariables.description: Indicates whether this is a Disease Milestone that can occur only once ("N") or a type of Disease Milestone that can occur multiple times ("Y").
datasetVariables.label: Disease Milestone Repetition Indicator
datasetVariables.name: TMRPT

description: A trial design domain that is used to describe disease milestones, which are observations or activities anticipated to occur in the course of the disease under study, and which trigger the collection of data. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C147270, 2018-06-29)
label: Trial Disease Milestones
name: TM
